import React from "react"; const Ordercard = ({ orderid, datetime, buyername, purchasedworth, orders, }) => { return ( <>
Order ID : {orderid}

{datetime}

Buyer’s Name : {buyername}

Purchsed worth : ₹ {purchasedworth}

Items : {orders}

More Details
); }; export default Ordercard;
